Development¶

This section contains the documentation for the source code itself. It will be particularly useful if you want to write and extension for ClusterGB, but is hopefully unnecessary for a regular user.

The only rule is that any new cgb_run_* calculation on the GB data should store results as a new Namespace in Job.results.

    • clustergb.bond_orientational_order
